About

I am a full-stack, Philadelphia-area jr. web-developer and former attorney with a passion for building beautiful, meaningful things.

My former career taught me practical problem-solving skills and enabled me to hone my analytical abilities.

Let me show you some stuff that demonstrates how I've married the two, except not bc I don't wanna be a lawyer anymore. Harumph.
